Texts.Chs: 当你解锁更多蓝图，你会发现你战斗，破坏和保护的潜力将成倍增加。
Texts.Eng: As you unlock more blueprints, you will find your potential for death, destruction and protection will increase exponentially.

Texts.Chs: 我敢肯定你不需要我告诉你^orange;护甲工作台^reset;能干什么！你可以在这里打造各式各样的盔甲和武器。我们可以通过打造一顶^orange;庶民头盔^reset;来玩玩。
Texts.Eng: I'm sure you don't need to be told what your ^orange;Armorworks^reset; does!  The armor and weapons you can create here are varied. Let's test it out by building a ^orange;Plebeian Cap^reset;.
